channel.title: Command....[317][delta]

item.title: Command....[317][delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

well, im making a command for a future “clan war” between aliens, ninja’s and humans…
the command is supposed to tele aliens to 1 place, ninja’s to 1 place, and humans to 1 place…
it has no compiler errors…
but, when i try to do the command, it just dces me

this is the command im using.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("war") && playerRights >= 3){ clanwar(); }

and this is the void im using.

public void clanwar() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p.alien == 1) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.triggerTele(2431, 3072, 0); castOn.sM("Go get those bastards!"); } else if(p.ninja == 1) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.triggerTele(2399, 3103, 0); castOn.sM("Go get those bastards!"); } else if(p.human == 1) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.triggerTele(2368, 3135, 0); castOn.sM("Go get those bastards!"); } } }

Read full topic
